thread.title: Dave

author: Dave
title: Dave
text: Tried the website to see what Quote: s i could get and was very pleased that offers were far better than i had hoped for. Had contact by phone and e mail with 2 dealerships Parkway Derby who were slow to respond and Johnsons VW Tamworth who were exceptionally proactive to find the exact car i wanted, i.e. Colour, auto and with panoramic sunroof. Using the Carwow dealership offer agreement on PX of my own car was made and we were away. Took delivery today 1 march 2017. Carwow experience excellent, and the same for Johnsons VW. Will se carlow again in future and would not hesitate to recommend them.
